summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3367 for the improvement of West 54th Street, from 8th Avenue Northwest to 14th Avenue Northwest; all in The City of Seattle, under Ordinance No.41566, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
